name: Basic Login Test
description: Tests the login functionality of a website

steps.description: Look for a login or sign-in button on the homepage and click it
steps.expected: A login form should appear with username/email and password fields

steps.description: Enter the username 'testuser@example.com' in the email/username field
steps.expected: The text should appear in the input field

steps.description: Enter the password 'testpassword' in the password field
steps.expected: The text should appear in the password field (likely masked)
The form should submit and either redirect to a dashboard or show an error message since these are test credentials

steps.description: Verify if login was successful or if an error message is displayed
steps.expected: Either we should see a dashboard/welcome page or an appropriate error message for invalid credentials
